description: Detects netsh commands that turns off the Windows firewall Author: Fatih Sirin. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Firewall Disabled via Netsh
query: (process.command_line:*netsh* AND process.command_line:*set* AND ((process.command_line:*firewall* AND process.command_line:*opmode* AND process.command_line:*mode\=disable*) OR (process.command_line:*advfirewall* AND process.command_line:*state* AND process.command_line:*off*)))
